Lyric:
[by:古咸]
[ti:Thinking out loud ( Severo remix )]
[ar:Jasmine Thompson]
[al:Thinking out loud ( Severo remix )]
[by:古咸]
[00:02.15]When your legs don't work like they used to before
[00:06.50]And I can't sweep you off of your feet
[00:11.37]Will your mouth still remember the taste of my love
[00:16.32]Will your eyes still smile from your cheeks
[00:19.75]Darlin' I will be lovin' you till we're seventy
[00:28.96]Baby my heart could still fall as hard at twenty three
[00:37.38]I'm thinkin' bout how
[00:39.12]People fall in love in mysterious ways
[00:43.85]Maybe just a touch of a hand
[00:48.83]Me I fall in love with you every single day
[00:53.36]I just wanna tell you I am
[00:57.54]So honey now
[01:18.58]When my hairs all've gone and my memory fades
[01:23.56]And the crowds dont remember my name
[01:26.60]When my hands don't play the strings the same way
[01:33.43]I know you will still love me the same
[01:36.76]'Cause honey your soul can never grow old it's evergreen
[01:45.83]Baby your smile's forever in my mind in memory
[01:53.39]I'm thinkin' bout how
[01:56.13]People fall in love in mysterious ways
[02:00.81]Maybe it's all part of a plan
[02:05.55]I just keep on making the same mistakes
[02:10.57]Hoping that you'll understand
[02:14.46]That baby now
[02:17.70]
